snippet.title: Beyond Flesh and Blood - New Gameplay Trailer - PC, Console - Partnered with Sold Out UK
snippet.description:
Here is the latest, full gameplay-only trailer for Beyond Flesh and Blood: the gory, fast-paced, agile mech shooter set in the UK city of Manchester.

Learn more:
Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/pixelbombgames
FB: http://www.facebook.com/beyondfleshandblood1
Twitter: http://twitter.com/BeyondFBGame

BEYOND FLESH AND BLOOD
Space is Easy.
Prepare for Earth.

Beyond Flesh and Blood provides the opportunity of experiencing an intense insight into a post-apocalyptic future. While you must uncover the truth, the objective is survival.

Remember to set up communications towers, hold down your victories against who wish to destroy you - and unlock the incredible power and agility of each of each mech, patching in weapon upgrades from fallen foes.

Ethan cannot die: mind control means remotely piloting a combat frame from the stasis of space, so once a frame is destroyed a new one is dropped in from orbit allowing the player to get straight back into the fight (score effected for dying).

Become the master of major future military tech as horror and sci-fi blend to meet their match – in you.

Beyond Flesh and Blood Twitter:  http://twitter.com/BeyondFBGame
Beyond Flesh and Blood Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/beyondfleshandblood1
Beyond Flesh and Blood website:  http://www.beyondfleshandbloodgame.com/wp/
http://b-fb.net
https://www.facebook.com/beyondfleshandblood1
https://wiki.unrealengine.com/Beyond_Flesh_and_Blood

"The action sees you fighting aliens and upgrading your mech from android like frames to hulking tanks and it is gory. 90s PC game gory." - Leon Hurley

Here you can discover a small glimpse of the heavy visceral combat and lost, dystopian landscapes which highlight the darkness of an abandoned planet... Beyond Flesh and Blood takes its inspiration from Manchester city centre. Find out more: http://www.beyondfleshandbloodgame.com

Video captured and edited by Lydia Hall, Pixelbomb Games Limited 2016.

Beyond Flesh and Blood
No such thing as the indiepocalypse...BEYOND FLESH AND BLOOD, an exciting new mech shooter IP, created by Pixelbomb Games for for PC and Console.
